channel.title: Architectures on rundgl
channel.description: Recent content in Architectures on rundgl

item.title: Diagram
item.description: This section details the architecture demonstrated in this reference field asset. Architecture Diagram graph LR J["JSON"] C["CSV"] A["Graphson"] R["RDBMS"] B["..."] H["HDFS"] G["DSE Graph"] S["rundgl script"] M["Groovy Mapper"]--"Business Logic"-->D J--"input"-->D["DGL"] C--"input"-->D H--"input"-->D R--"input"-->D A--"input"-->D B--"input"-->D S--"executes"-->D D--"bulk loading"-->G The DGL is a single process, multi-threaded app, that can take data from multiple sources and using business logic defined in a groovy mapping file, load the data in a bulk fashion into DSE Graph.
